name: content-wand
description: Transform any content into 9 platform-native formats or convert between content types — with optional brand voice matching. Supports Twitter/X, LinkedIn, newsletter, Instagram, YouTube Shorts, TikTok, Threads, Bluesky, and podcast. Works from text, URLs, transcripts, rough notes, or a topic idea. Secure-by-default with prompt injection defenses.
author: Prajwal Mishra
